item.description:
Hi everyone!

This is a social event as discussed at the last meetup. It is the Puppy Love Shack singles mixer to benefit the MSPCA Animal Car and Adoption Center. Erin O'Malley from MIX985fm is our bachelorette of the evening. There will be hors d'oeuvres, cheese selection, sushi, etc for the humans. The pups can "pig-out" on JP Licks doggie sorbet, a Valentine cake from Sweet Tooth and gourmet all-natural cookies from the Pet Shop Girls. Planet Dog give-aways and much more. The donation is $25 per person, dogs get in FREE.

Please call to sign up fpr the event. Space is limited! six one seven, four two six, seven three eight seven, ext 221.
item.name: Puppy Love Shack singles mixer
